<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Limited">
[Join Pasts](/Spells.aspx?ID=552)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 74

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 2 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

With touches to the targets’ foreheads, you bring them into mental communion. The targets can share thoughts and experiences, but not words. When one target attempts to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), the other can [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) the first target’s skill check, using any [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill (even if that Lore wouldn’t normally apply) without having made any preparations to Aid.

---
**Heightened (+1)** You can touch one additional target to include them in the spell’s effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
name: Join Pasts
